name: Caveman Warriors
description: Jump back in time and free your inner caveman. Smash heads in this local cooperative platformer game. Play solo or team up with up to 4 players. Inspired by games like New Super Mario, Joe & Mac, Metal Slug and Trine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 1 GB available space
